'''''Deconica inquilina''''' is a species of [[mushroom]] in the [[Strophariaceae]] family.  Formerly a member of the genus ''[[Psilocybe]]'' (well known for its [[psilocybin]] containing members), this species belonged to the non-blueing (non-[[hallucinogenic]]) clade<ref name=Moncalvo2002/> and was consequently moved to ''[[Deconica]]'' in 2009.<ref name=Norvell2009/>

==Habitat and distribution==
''Deconica inquilina'' is found growing on decaying grass.  It is very widely distributed, reported from North America, South America and Europe.<ref name=Guzman2005/>
